entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then light snow changing to periods of rain near midnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
